WorkItem.ClosedComment: This was related to a bug in averaged mode of mirror images.
WorkItem.Description: Included character file. When I change the fight time from 300 to 360, the item values decrease drastically and value bars take on the green color that the Rogue model appears to have. However, the stats tab still says I am in the Mage model.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Changing the fight time to 360 appears to change the model to Rogue?

Comments.Message: It seems to be 360 only, if you go slighly higher or lower it'll be fine. I'll look into what is causing this, looks like one constraint gets broken in that specific case. By the way you don't go into Rogue model, there's always that green for survivability, it just show 0 dps because of the bug.
